name: Every Monday
description:
Do you hate Mondays?

Well so does my guy in the thumbnail.

Do your absolute best to make it through Monday in Every Monday.

He's on his way home, and has just ONE more bus to get to before he makes it!

If you run into too many disturbances, he'll get annoyed and SNAP!

He'll really appreciate it if you could make it to the next bus unscathed.

Give it a whirl!

This build has small UI adjustments in it. The original Mini Jam submission (without the UI adjustments) can be found here:

https://protagonist-plot-armor.itch.io/every-monday-original-submission
